item.title: 英国通胀率保持在 2024 年初以来的最高水平
item.description: 英国 8 月份的通胀率保持在 1 年半以来的最高水平，这又是一个令人不安的数据，可能会让英国央行官员对进一步降息保持警惕。【原文：UK inflation held at the highest level in more than 1 1/2 years in August, another uncomfortable reading that is likely to keep Bank of England officials wary over cutting interest rates further.】

item.title: 由 H&F 投资的安保公司 Verisure 首次公开募股募集 31 亿欧元资金
item.description: 赫尔曼-弗里德曼（Hellman & Friedman）支持的报警公司 Verisure Plc 宣布，该公司计划通过在斯德哥尔摩首次公开发行股票募集约 31 亿欧元（37 亿美元）资金，此次上市备受瞩目，可能成为三年来欧洲最大的此类交易。【原文：Hellman & Friedman-backed alarm firm Verisure Plc announced it’s planning to raise about €3.1 billion ($3.7 billion) via an initial public offering in Stockholm, a highly anticipated listing that could be Europe’s largest such deal in three years.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国 8 月通胀保持在远高于英国央行目标的水平
恒大清算人寻求接管前首席执行官夏海钧资产
item.description: 中国恒大集团的清算人正在寻求接管前首席执行官夏海钧及其前妻的资产，他们试图在公司清盘 20 个月后为债权人收回更多资金。【原文：China Evergrande Group’s liquidators are seeking receivership of ex-Chief Executive Officer Xia Haijun and his ex-wife’s assets, as they try to recuperate more money for creditors 20 months after the firm was wound up.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织考虑下一步行动，塞内加尔债券成为非洲唯一的输家
item.description: 塞内加尔的欧元债券是本月非洲回报率最低的债券，因为投资者在等待国际货币基金组织对这个西非国家少报债务问题的调查结果时，在短暂反弹后回撤。【原文：Senegal’s eurobonds are posting the weakest returns in Africa this month as investors pull back after a brief rally while they await the outcome of an International Monetary Fund inquiry into the underreporting of the West African country’s debt.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴借助大客户中国联通加快人工智能芯片研发步伐
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）的人工智能芯片在中国联通获得了备受瞩目的客户，这表明中国科技领军企业的新兴半导体业务正在其国内市场获得牵引力。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. has secured high-profile customer in China Unicom for its AI chips, suggesting the Chinese tech leader’s nascent semiconductor efforts are gaining traction in its home market.】

item.title: 香港允许以较低价格购房申请投资签证
item.description: 香港正在降低申请投资者签证的购房门槛，以促进香港房地产市场的发展。【原文：Hong Kong is lowering its threshold for home purchases by people applying for an investor visa to bolster the city’s property market.】

item.title: 新加坡与香港加强银行监管合作
item.description: 新加坡和香港的监管机构正在加强合作，对这两个主要金融中心的银行进行监管。【原文：Singapore and Hong Kong regulators are strengthening cooperation to supervise banks in the two key financial hubs.】

item.title: Prosus 在印度城市公司 18 亿美元首次公开募股前将其股份增加一倍
item.description: Prosus 印度生态系统负责人阿舒托什-夏尔马（Ashutosh Sharma）表示，在印度初创公司 Urban Co.上市之前，Prosus NV 已将其在该公司的股份增加了一倍多，目前已成为该公司最大的股东之一。【原文：Prosus NV has more than doubled its stake in Urban Co. ahead of the Indian startup’s listing, and is now one of the firm’s biggest shareholders, according to Prosus India Ecosystem head Ashutosh Sharma.】

item.title: 瑞士对取消财产税的支持在投票前减弱
item.description: 在不到两周的时间内，瑞士将就全面改革住房征税问题进行投票，而在投票之前，一项废除瑞士拥有百年历史的房产税的提案正在失去选民的支持。【原文：A proposal to abolish a century-old property tax in Switzerland is losing support among voters ahead of a ballot in less than two weeks on overhauling housing levies.】

item.title: 通胀接近目标，加纳将再次大幅降息
item.description: 由于预计通胀率将在年底前重返目标范围，加纳央行将再次实施超大规模降息。【原文：Ghana’s central bank is set to deliver another supersized interest-rate cut as inflation is expected to return to its target range before year-end.】

item.title: 日本 20 年期债券拍卖出现 2020 年以来最强劲需求
item.description: 日本 20 年期国债周三拍卖吸引了 2020 年以来最强劲的需求，尽管国内政治存在不确定性，但较高的收益率吸引了投资者。【原文：Japan’s 20-year government bond auction Wednesday drew the strongest demand since 2020, as higher yields lured investors despite domestic political uncertainty.】

item.title: 人民币升值，黄金价格飙升，中国黄金进口将更加顺畅
item.description: 中国央行正计划放宽对黄金进口的限制，这标志着中国向开放全球最大的金银市场迈出了一小步。【原文：China’s central bank is making plans to ease restrictions on gold imports, marking a small step toward liberalizing the world’s biggest market for bullion.】

item.title: 日本汽车制造商承诺保持工资增长势头
item.description: 日本汽车制造商表示，他们将努力保持工资增长的良性循环，因为最近与美国达成的贸易协议使该行业避免了特朗普政府关税行动的 "灾难性 "影响。【原文：Japanese carmakers said they will strive to keep up the positive cycle of wage growth as a recent trade deal with the US enables the industry to avoid “catastrophic” impact from the Trump administration’s tariff campaign.】

item.title: 百度股价大涨，分析师上调内部芯片风险投资评级
item.description: 一位分析师以百度内部芯片业务的增长潜力为由，提升了这家中国互联网公司的评级，百度股价因此创下两年多来的最大涨幅。【原文：Baidu Inc. shares jumped by the most in over two years after an analyst upgraded the Chinese internet firm, citing the growth potential for its in-house chip business.】

item.title: Urban Co.交易首秀或将提振印度市场情绪
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: RBC BlueBay 看多日元，关注日本央行加息和领导层投票
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行蓝湾资产管理公司（RBC BlueBay Asset Management）持有日元多头头寸，押注日本政治过渡和日本央行可能在 10 月份加息会推动日元进一步走强。【原文：RBC BlueBay Asset Management has taken a long yen position, betting that Japan’s political transition and a possible Bank of Japan rate hike in October could drive further strength in the currency.】

item.title: 投资者押注人工智能，中国科技股飙升至 2021 年水平
item.description: 由于对人工智能的乐观情绪刺激了需求，在香港上市的中国科技股跃升至近四年来的最高水平。【原文：Chinese technology stocks listed in Hong Kong jumped to their highest level in almost four years as optimism over artificial intelligence fueled demand.】

item.title: 中国科技巨头为何掀起人工智能融资热潮？
item.description: 中国科技行业的公司一直在筹集数十亿美元的资金，以提高其人工智能能力和其他数字基础设施。【原文：Companies in China’s technology sector have been raising billions in capital to advance their artificial intelligence capabilities and other digital infrastructure.】

item.title: 印度今年最受欢迎的大型 IPO 即将开始交易
item.description: Urban Co. 将于周三在孟买开始交易，此前该公司完成了印度今年超额认购最多的大型首次公开募股。【原文：Urban Co. will begin trading in Mumbai on Wednesday after wrapping up India’s most oversubscribed major initial public offering this year.】

item.title: 亚洲股指再创新高，驱动因素远不止中国
item.description: 亚洲股市在四年多的时间里首次创下历史新高，对中国依赖程度的降低被认为是这轮反弹的持久动力。【原文：Asian equities have reached their first record high in more than four years, with a reduced reliance on China seen underpinning the rally’s staying power.】

item.title: 腾讯、百度出售创纪录点心债券以获取廉价资金
item.description: 中国互联网公司正在香港点心债券市场上筹集创纪录的资金，因为它们希望获得廉价融资，为其人工智能雄心壮志提供动力。【原文：Chinese internet firms are raising a record amount of funds in Hong Kong’s dim sum bond market, as they look to secure cheap financing to power their artificial intelligence ambitions.】

item.title: 美国科技股热潮过后，香港日内交易者追逐杠杆 ETF
item.description: 今年夏天，Pat Miao 辞去了香港办公室的工作，她获得了其他东西：有时间在华尔街最狂野的角落之一进行交易。现年 30 岁的她目前在一些基金上下注，这些基金的日回报率是特斯拉公司、AT&T 公司等热门美国科技股的两倍或三倍。【原文：When Pat Miao walked away from her Hong Kong office job this summer, she gained something else: time to trade in one of Wall Street’s wildest corners. The 30-year-old now wagers on funds that offer double or triple the daily returns of popular US tech stocks such as Tesla Inc.】

item.title: 美元在 FOMC 利率决议前接近三年低点
item.description: 在美联储做出决定之前，彭博社的美元指数接近2022年3月以来的最低水平，预计决策者将继续降息，以支撑疲软的劳动力市场。【原文：Bloomberg’s gauge of the dollar approached its lowest level since March 2022 ahead of the Federal Reserve decision where policymakers are expected to resume cutting interest rates to prop up a weakening labor market.】

item.title: 新西兰经常账户缺口因特穆效应大幅缩小
item.description: 新西兰的经常账户赤字在进口额下调后大幅收窄，原因是Temu等电子商务零售商寄来了更多低价值的包裹。【原文：New Zealand’s current account deficit has narrowed dramatically after a downward revision to imports because of more low-value parcels arriving from e-commerce retailers like Temu.】

item.title: 美联储利率决议前美元下挫，黄金维持在历史记录附近
item.description: 受交易员对周三美联储会议降息的押注提振，黄金保持了最近的涨势，首次突破每盎司 3,700 美元。【原文：Gold held its latest gains that saw it rise above $3,700 an ounce for the first time, boosted by traders’ bets for a rate cut at Wednesday’s Federal Reserve meeting.】

item.title: Five Point 支持的 WaterBridge 在扩大 IPO 规模后融资 6.34 亿美元
item.description: WaterBridge Infrastructure LLC 在美国的首次公开募股中募集了 6.34 亿美元，其股票定价为市场区间的最高价。【原文：WaterBridge Infrastructure LLC raised $634 million in its upsized US initial public offering, pricing its shares at the top of a marketed range.】

item.title: 美国出口下滑，日本出口连续第四个月下降
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策继续给全球商业，尤其是涉美贸易的前景蒙上阴影，日本出口连续第四个月下降。【原文：Japan’s exports fell for the fourth consecutive month as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs continued to cloud the prospects for global commerce, especially for trade involving the US.】

item.title: 关注俄罗斯供应风险，石油维持三日涨势
item.description: 由于交易商在评估乌克兰对俄罗斯原油基础设施的袭击所造成的影响，石油在连续三日上涨后趋于平稳。【原文：Oil steadied after a three-day gain as traders assess the fallout from Ukrainian attacks on Russian crude infrastructure.】

item.title: 印尼将维持利率不变，商业银行独立成为焦点：指南
item.description: 在抗议活动导致总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）收紧对权力的控制数周后，印尼正在重启财政和货币引擎，在周三做出维持利率稳定的预期决定之前，再次引发了人们对中央银行独立性的担忧。【原文：Indonesia is revving up fiscal and monetary engines weeks after protests led President Prabowo Subianto to tighten his grip on power, reviving concerns over central bank independence ahead of an expected decision Wednesday to hold interest rates steady.】
